resources.string: All your data is gone forever.
"Couldn't find a GDG in your region? Great, go ahead and start one. Fill the form below and expect to hear from us shortly! "
Got your application request!! Oh well, not really. This is a test form just for educational purposes. If you really want to submit your application please visit the website!

GDGs are local groups of developers who are specifically interested in Google products and APIs. Each local group is called a GDG chapter and can host a variety of technical activities for developers - from just a few people getting together to watch our latest videos, to large gatherings with demos and tech talks, to hackathons. Google Developers supports and recognizes GDG chapters, but doesn’t own or manage them.

️Run by passionate individuals in local developer communities
 ️A group to share ideas and network with fellow developers 
 ️A place to learn about Google technologies and development tools 
 Open to and free for all interested
Waiting for location and network result.\n\n If running on an emulator open the Maps app to enable location services.
Photo from stage from a devfest
Tell us a bit more about why do you want to start a GDG
Please enter your motivation in 1-2 sentences
Submitted, no need to submit again
How do you like your egg?
Mini Paint is a simple line drawing app. Drag your fingers to draw. Rotate the phone to clear.

• Find the Android hidden behind the dark surface. 
 	 • Touch and hold the screen for the spotlight. 
 	 • Once you find the Android, lift your finger to end the game. 
 
 	 • To restart the game touch the screen again.
